author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is an attempt to resolve https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47835.
After the merge of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47630 illegal `PoolDBESSource` parameters will generate a framework Configuration exception.
The goal of this PR is remove all the remaining illegal parameters in untested configuration files.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles. Technical, no regression expected.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, might be backported to CMSSW_15_0_X.
title: Removal of illegal `PoolDBESSource` parameters
